name: VHS tape
description: An ancient plastic tome of unknowable analog mysteries.

name: Tampered Condom
description: A condom that has been tampered with, reducing its effectiveness.

name: High-Tech Condom
description: A ring of elastisteel tech designed to be affixed to the base of the penis. When activated it produces a special low-level forcefield that protects without dulling sensation.

name: Rope
description: A length of rope. Abundant in ropelike qualities and suitable for all rope-related activities.

name: Stonecock Pill
description: A pill that gets you hard. Based on an ancient formula from a lost age.

name: Staylong Pill
description: This pill allegedly enhances male sexual performance by increasing stamina and libido, and boosting blood flow to the penis to enhance its girth and length temporarily.

name: Sperminator Pill
description: This pill stimulates semen production, causing excessive cum during intercourse. More sperm means a greater chance of impregnation.

name: Spanish Fly Pill
description: This pill supposedly sends female libido into overdrive. A time-honoured facilitator of romance.

name: Shard of Euphoria
description: An extremely dangerous mind-addling substance that is incredibly popular among the mutants.

name: Mother's Milk
description: Very special breast milk from the woman who birthed you.

name: Blackblood
description: A bitter venom used as a drug by savage tribes of the hellscapes.

name: Milk of Isis
description: The milk of a goddess.

name: 180 Pill
description: Turns hate to love and love to hate, for a short period of time.

name: LibiGo Pill
description: A pill that dramatically reduces arousal.

name: Amnesium Pill
description: This pill puts whoever imbibes it into a drowsy, dissoriented and forgetful state. Dissolves instantly in liquids.

name: Fairy Dust
description: Sparkling flecks of dust that, when inhaled or snorted, make you feel so high you think you can fly. Many lives have been lost due to its use.

name: Bio-Spray
description: A Ultrasporin-brand aerosol healing spraycan. They stopped making this stuff a long time ago.

name: CliMaxx Pill
description: An aphrodisiac pill to enhance a woman's enjoyment of sex. It won't put her in the mood but she will certainly enjoy herself more.

name: OvuPro Pill
description: This pill is a powerful female fertility aid. Though ancient, its potency is still not entirly lost.

name: Breast Milk
description: A nutritious beverage that is almost as delicious as its source.
